description: Table read by antidiagonals of Fibonacci-type sequences.
formula: T(n, k) = T(n, k-1)+T(n, k-2) [with T(n, 0) = n and T(n, 1) = 1] = 2*T(n-1, k)-T(n-2, k) = Fib(k)+n*Fib(k-1) = (s^k*(1+2n/s)-t^k*(1+2n/t))/(2^k*sqrt(5)) where s = (1+sqrt(5))/2 and t = (1-sqrt(5))/2 = 1-s.G.f. for n-th row: (n+x-nx)/(1-x-x^2).
crossrefs: Rows are (essentially) A000045, A000045, A000032, A000285, A022095, A022096, A022097, etc. Columns are (essentially) A001477, A000012, A000027, A005408, A016789, A016885, etc. One of the diagonals is A007502.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 31 2000
